Presence Sense (4)                  Psi-Shield (30)                                   I.S.P.: 6
 See Aura (6)                        Psi-Sword (30)                                       This is a mental probe that will indicate the presence of psionic
 See the Invisible (4)               Pyrokinesis (varies)                              energy within the immediate area. The probe can not be used to pinpoint
 Sense Evil (2)                      Telekinesis (super) (10 + )                       the exact location of psychic energy nor the level of power other than
 Sense Magic (3)                     Telekinetic Force Field (30)                      a vague sense of weak, medium, or powerful, but will indicate whether
 Sixth Sense (2)                     Telemechanics (10)                                an individual is psychic by directing the probe at a specific person (does
 Speed Reading (2)                                                                     not reveal the type or strength of the person's powers other than low,
 Telepathy (4)                                                                         medium, high). It will also indicate whether a group mind block is in
 Total Recall (2)                                                                      effect and if a person is psionically possessed.
raw_snippet: 114 Descriptions of Psionic Abilities Healing Bio-Regenerate (self) (6) points per melee. In addition, when cuts and scrapes are healed through Deaden Pain (4) Super bio-regeneration there is NO scarring. The psionic can regenerate as Detect Psionics (6) Exorcism (10) (Limited to the often as once every other minute. Healing Touch (6) Mind Melter O.C.C.) Increased Healing (10) Bio-Manipulation (10) Induce Sleep (4) Bio-Regeneration (super) (20) Deaden Pain Range: Immediate proximity, touch or within 3ft (0.9m). Psychic Diagnosis (4) Electrokinesis (varies) Duration: One hour per level of experience. Psychic Purification (8) Empathic Transmission (6) Length of Trance: Two minutes (8 melee rounds). Psychic Surgery (14) Group Mind Block (22) I.S.P.: 4 Resist Fatigue (4) Hydrokinesisâ€¦
